title: Ricki Lake thinks Simon Cowell 'went back on' word axing Olivia Olson from X Factor
text:

Ricki Lake has backed her The X Factor: Celebrity co-star Olivia Olson following her surprise exit from the show this weekend - with Ricki also voted off.

The celebrity version of the series went live for the first time this weekend, with a double elimination causing chaos.

Ricki was initially voted out by the public, while Olivia lost out to Martin Bashir in the judges' vote - with Simon believing the public would want to see more of him.

As Simon Cowell had the casting vote, he opted to send home Olivia who burst into tears over the decision, while later sharing her own surprise that she was booted off.

Viewers called the show a "fix" in the fallout, with many not happy with the decision.

(Image: ITV)

Speaking on Loose Women on Monday, Ricki revealed her co-star was "devastated" by the events of Saturday night.

Not only that, but she suggested Simon did go back on his word to the Love Actually child star.

Joining the panel in a guest role for the day, she said: "I know there's some controversy about that.

(Image: ITV)

"I mean I also love Martin Bashir, and I understand how entertaining he is.

"It seems Simon went back on what he said to her during her critique, you know, he said she was the dark horse and she could go far."

Ricki added: "I felt for her... she was devastated."

(Image: ITV)

On her own exit, she explained that while she was gutted to leave so soon, she was there "for the experience".

Olivia herself took to Instagram over her exit, telling her followers: "I’ll keep smiling. I knew going into @thexfactor anything could happen & the level of talent was so high this year!

"I’m grateful for the opportunity as it has completely pushed me out of my comfort zone, reminding myself I love to be up on that stage. That being said, yes my elimination came as a shock.

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

"I was confused why Simon would tell me I could win this competition and then ultimately send me home. It was a punch in the gut.

"People have emotions and mine got the best of me...because I REALLY wanted this.

"I’m proud of my performance last night and that’s what matters to me. Good luck to all my new friends I’ve made a long the way. OO out!"

The X Factor: Celebrity continues next Saturday live on ITV.
description: The X Factor: Celebrity star Olivia Olson was 'devastated' to leave the show, Ricki Lake revealed on Loose Women
